messages.message:
Hey folks! We're going to be updating the dogfood cluster with some changes shortly:
• Consolidation of nodes to AZ us-east1-d
• Migration to a common, preemptible node pool for stateless workloads
This will cause pod restarts which may trigger some alerts in <#C01E4D91VK5|>, but should subside as soon as the pods are scheduled onto the new pool. Please reach out at any time if you have any questions or concerns!

cc @shaunak @shiqi @amit.gupta @sudeep
@sean.donohoe is this still on going? trying to debug something from dogfood and wonder if it is still in the middle of the update
Yes, but none of the pods are down at the moment
yeah I am getting intermit error from the file api when batch downloading files, will wait until all clear then
hm, that shouldn't be failing at the moment -- what's the error you're getting?
